message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a price that I think is a great value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.

I appreciate your offer, Alice.  While $12,000 is tempting, I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you consider selling it to me for $10,000? It's still a good deal for you, and it gets me closer to my target price.

I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11,500. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
